    • 方法详细资料

      • toUrl

        java.lang.String toUrl(java.lang.String key,
                       Param param,
                       boolean encode)
                throws EjuParamException
        参数:
        key - url key, such as 'aaa' in this url: http://example.com?aaa=1 * @param param
        param - param converted to url
        encode - whether url should be encoded
        返回:
        url
        抛出:
        EjuParamException - if error in converting process

      • toUrl

        protected abstract java.lang.String toUrl(Param param)
                                   throws EjuParamException
        convert param to url
        参数:
        param - param converted to url
        返回:
        url representation
        抛出:
        EjuParamException - if error in converting process

      • fromUrl

        protected abstract Param fromUrl(java.lang.String query)
                          throws EjuParamException
        convert params to type Param
        参数:
        query - url to be converted
        返回:
        if Param could be converted, returns instance. Otherwise, returns null
        抛出:
        EjuParamException - if error in converting process

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
